fields.description:
Description:
In KitchenSink, in local URL, text "Click me to hide the Toolbar" and an apple logo should be rendered, but are not.

Steps to reproduce:
1) Install KS with 1.8.0.1
2) Navigate to Base UI>Views>Web Views>Local URL


Result:
No "click me..." text or apple logo image are rendered 

Expected:
"Click me..." text allowing hiding of the toolbar and an apple logo.

Note:
Does not occur with 1.7.5
fields.summary: Android: HTML - v8/rhino - Some image and text items not rendering
